remarks:
A subclass condition on the members of two classes that implies a subclass relation on their unions.  Proposition 8.6 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 59.  See ~ iunss2 for a generalization to indexed unions. (Contributed by NM, 22-Mar-2004.) 

---

 A subclass condition on the members of two classes that implies a subclass relation on their unions.  Proposition 8.6 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 59.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Mar-2004.)
statement:
uniss2 $p |- ( A. x e. A E. y e. B x C_ y -> U. A C_ U. B ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x y $.
